author: modena
title: Curve around your room... if you have a train!
review:
I got this set a long time ago. I'm not sure if this is the right one, but I do own some curved tracks!

Pros

  • Curve your Duplo track layout!
  • The trains don't fall off easily!

Cons

  • You can't attach them to your building plates.
  • Not many tracks.
  • You must have a train first!

Overall:

You just get 4 tracks in this set. Of course it's cheap, so you can get more. These are my only curved tracks I own, so I'm happy to own this set. The irritating thing is that, like in City tracks, you can't attach these tracks to plates. 

Overall, this is a great Train accessory, but only get it if you have a train!
